br.uff.midiacom.ana.meta
Class NCLMetadata<M extends NCLMetadata>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.meta.NCLMetadata<M>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, java.lang.Comparable<M>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLMetadata<M extends NCLMetadata>
extends NCLElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<M>

Esta classe define o elemento metadata da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define uma árvore RDF de metadados para o documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
